name: Drakomon Legends: Monster Dragon Battle RPG Games
summary: Drakomon is a fun 3D RPG where you collect monsters and fight battles in an epic journey to become the best trainer in the world of Dragonia. Capture multiple monsters with unique stats and skills. Featuring a beautiful, immersive 3D world with an engrossing storyline and fully animated 3D battles. Play online duels versus trainers from all over the world.
